instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: MacBook Pro 15" 2010 - trackpad moves very slow after 15 minutes
threads.message:
I vaguely remember reading that it is a symptom of the GPU failing, caused  by the capacitor. But I can not find it back anymore... 
Can anyone confirm or point me in the right direction?

Thank you!

threads.title: MacBook Pro 15" 2010 - trackpad moves very slow after 15 minutes
threads.message:
820-2850 MLB is known for C9560 issue.
Maybe not related with your fault, but this cap must be changed anyway.
Do NOT use hot-air to change it.
